name: skill-creator
description: Guide for creating production-ready Agent Skills. Covers 6 quality standards (token efficiency, mental models, anti-patterns), 5 skill type patterns (Minimal Mindset, Tool Operation, Process-Oriented, Philosophy+Execution, Navigation Router), progressive disclosure design, loading triggers (MANDATORY syntax, conditional routing), and validation checklists. Use when creating new skills, improving existing skills, or diagnosing skill effectiveness.
